name: Boating Adventures
description:
Welcome to Boating Adventures! Boating Adventures is a game where you swerve your way around incoming logs in a boat to survive.

Made in a week for MiniLD 68.

Credits

BGM:

"Relaxing" by Beau Bear (https://soundcloud.com/beau-bear/relaxing)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution Share-Alike 4.0 License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/sa/4.0/)

Water Backgrounds:

1: Pixabay (https://pixabay.com/static/uploads/photo/2015/11/0...)

2: Ambers Stock (http://ambersstock.deviantart.com/art/Blue-Water-I...)

3: Pexels (https://static.pexels.com/photos/6644/sea-water-oc...)

4: OkBrightStar (http://okbrightstar-stock.deviantart.com/art/Water...)

Boats: chabull (http://opengameart.org/content/ships-with-ripple-e...)

Logs: isaiah658 (https://openclipart.org/detail/218084/pixel-log-si...)

Made by Sea Pixel Studios

Enjoy!

WASD and Arrow keys supported
